speaker: Maelle
line: Verso, stop! You can’t just decide this for everyone!

speaker: Verso
line: We’re all hypocrites, doing the same thing to each other.

speaker: Maelle
line: What about Lune and Sciel and Monoco? What about Esquie?

speaker: Verso
line: Sciel was right. Grief blinds us. All you see are walls. I’ve lived a long time, Maelle. There are things we can never outrun.

speaker: Maelle
line: I’m so tired, Verso. Please, can we just go home and talk about this? Don’t do this. Don’t leave me again.

speaker: Verso
line: It’s gonna be ok… It’s gonna be ok, huh? You’ve got this incredible power to paint. You’ll never have to suffer a life you don’t want. You’re ok. You’re ok. You’re ok.

speaker: Verso
line: I will miss you guys. It’s ok. It’s over. Verso.
